cx_cxd106_onix152.name: CyanEX CXD106 (ONIX 152)
cx_cxd106_onix152.description:
Created by: Zbx1425

Type-M suspended monorail EMU train based on the MTR S-Train, with the CyanEX livery.
Features a LCD dynamic PIS system implemented with JavaScript capabilities.
Operated APM services at TeaCon 2023.
